name: One Button (Something#53)
description:
One morning, you wake up to find that you have been kidnapped by a large button seeking your help.

Made for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam 6.

Sources of external assets used:

  • https://www.pinterest.com.au/pin/594897432003751008/
  • https://freesound.org/s/222372/
  • https://freesound.org/s/66690/
  • http://www.freepngclipart.com/free-png/42007-blue-light-laser-beam-free-transparent-image-hq
  • http://www.orangefreesounds.com/epic-battle-music/
  • zapsplat.com
  • some default assets from a unity example project
